TopicTitle: Do surface bases still wig out?

Articles.Content: I remember last time I made a large surface base (a couple editions back), it flipped over on loading. Does this still happen? If so, is there any way to prevent it other than making smaller bases?
It doesn't really happen much anymore. That jumping behavior has been minimized to a large degree in the current version.

one tips, don't use landing legs, use structural parts. landing legs especially if you dock parts together and combine with ISRU might behave bad as weight has changed on load.
